definition: old rice/rice kept for many years
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale

sentences.english: The rice harvested before may be used for wine production.
sentences.chinese: 这些陈米可能会被用来酿酒。

sentences.english: With the prescription, the organoleptic investigation of the old rice was the best.
sentences.chinese: 在此配方下，陈米的感官评定结果最佳。

sentences.english: Mr. Michael Chan and Dr. Ross Trethewy introduce the construction safe design concept in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 陈米高与罗斯卓达伟博士介绍澳洲建造安全设计原理。

definition: long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice 粳米[jing1 mi3])
husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)
sticky rice/short-grain rice/Oryza sativa var. japonica
semipolished rice (i.e. rice minus the husk, but including the germ)
to swell on steaming (of hard rice grain)
